name: Escape from Heaven (baerheather)
description:
This is a short interactive story about a journey through Heaven and the things that are there.

This story unfortunately does not have sound or music due to my limited skill sets. Please feel free to put on your own relaxing music.

Controls:

Up: Arrow up, W

Down: Arrow down, S

Left: Arrow Left, A

Right: Arrow Right, D

A: Alt, z, j

B: Control, k, x

Start: Enter

Select: Shift

Hey Everyone!

This is a personal project of mine that I have been working on and off for the past year. It's the first time I've ever done something like this so I apologies for any errors. This project was both a lot of fun to work on and the biggest pain in the ass. I had a lot of things I wanted to do and I had a lot of problems. Overall though, I'm happy I was able to complete my first game. And to all of you who play it, thank you, and I hope you like it!

-Heather Baer
